#### Nested notes

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam,

:::note
You can nest any Markdown content types inside an aside !

```js
new Sequence()
.effect()
.play()
```
:::

## Blockquotes

> Straightforward and simple enough!
>
> No need to go any further to explain how it works ... Maybe one more thing ... You need to leave an empty line in the `*.mdx` file to create a new paragraph.

## Code Blocks

The copy code button is always there by default.

.effect()
.play()
